item.title: Habanero Hot Sauce
item.description: Notes wear gloves ventilate very well or you will pepper spray yourself store for up to 3 months in the refrigerator Ingredients 15-20 habanero peppers 1/2 cup white vinegar 4 teaspoons olive oil 4 teaspoons white sugar 2 cloves garlic 1/2 teaspoon salt Directions wash peppers thoroughly remove stems and seeds; roughly chop peppers and garlic heat oil in medium sauce pan over low heat add the peppers and cover; cook, stirring occasionally until pepper soften, about 8 minutes add the garlic; continue cooking until fragrant, about 2 minutes add vinegar, sugar, and salt bring to a simmer, cover, cook for 10 minutes on low heat remove from heat and allow to cool for 10 minutes, covered pour mixture into a blender or food processor, blend until smooth
